title: Trondheims skjulte narkoverden
desc: A 4 part series where we explore Trondheims dark secerts.

title: Oppdragene politiet helst vil unngå
desc: Design & code

title: harjeg.net
desc: just for fun

title: Ti år har gått siden Utøya - nå kan vi lese at terroristen ikke gjorde en god nok jobb
På 50 år ble minst 68 personer savnet og aldri funnet i Trøndelag
Eiendomsskatten 2021
desc: Ny endring i kalkulering av eiendomskatt, her kan du se hva du må betale etter endringene.

title: En familie i Trondheim: Et år med korona
desc: Vi følge en familie under korona, Hvordan forklarer man en ettåring at han ikke kan røre sin koronasyke mamma?

title: Korona oversikten
desc: Korona oversikten til Adresseavisen, få daglige oppdaterte tall på korona smittede, vaksinerte og generell info.

title: Jakten på Max
desc:
How a hacker with stolen NTNU-passwords got access to snapchat, facebook and dropbox accounts of women. 
Part: 2: To rop om hjelp 
Part 3: Project Carbon

title: Vestfronten
desc: An interactive look at Trondheims Cathedrals west wall

title: Hvem kan redde Emma?
desc: Who can save Emma?" A story about a girl with suicidal thoughts.

title: VM-Pallen
desc: Har kunne du tippe hvem som kom på pallen under Ski vm i 2019. Det ble satt opp poeng og en topp liste på hvem som tippet best.

title: Karolinernes dødsmarsjen
desc: Built upon what i learned from "Trøndelag saves the world" we mapped out Trøndelag in 3D (map from kartverket), rendered paper figures on the map to recreate historic battles in Trøndelag 300 years ago.

title: Anne
desc: Handwritten notes that animates inn with SVG, using masks and css animations.

title: Trøndelags 109 Olympic medals
desc: Taking advantage of the canvas element to crate interactive "medals" that flow throughout the website and arranges itself in different forms to represent figures or statistics.

title: Toll Calculator
desc: In Trøndelag, Norway we are getting more tolls, this calculator lets you write in location A and B then calculates all the tolls you will pass, and how much money that would cost you.

title: Møllenberg
desc: Møllenberg in Trondheim are turning into student apartments, so we wanted to figure out how much of the people owning property in Møllenberg lives there. With the norwegian stock database and a few rabbithole scripts we managed to find the person who owns the most. My part in this publication was mainly gathering big-data, and handling it.

title: This years best christmas beer
desc: An news article with a searchable form with beer information about the best christmas beers.Whats special about this publication? On mobile all images are cropped to fit the image of the beer with an algorithm that will automatically find where in the picture the beer is then crop it to remove whitespace.

title: St. Olavs stories
desc: I made a crowdsource application so people can send there stories from St. Olavs Hospital, Trondheim Norway. This is made with a moderation backend so journalists can edit the stories or reject them.

title: Trøndelag saves the world
desc: How to fit a lot of data in one article without loosing peoples interests, we started with a WebGL renderer and made ocean, we present data in a readable way while animation the background in 3D.

title: UKA Revyen 100
desc: An interactive player that takes a look behind Norways oldest student play.

title: Moose shot each year timeline
desc: An interactive map with a time slider that shows how much Moose were shot that year in each county relative to the one with most shots.

title: Trondheims Steepest
desc: Build upon Trondheim Marathon backend I extended it to support multiple cameras, so the participants can now get a full video montage of their race.

title: Trondheim Marathon
desc: Search up yourself and find the moment you finished the marathon. Made with a TV feel

title: 47 Mayors
desc: Two of our top journalists interviewed 47 mayers in what would be the new Trøndelag, so I made map with all the mayers and the interview.

title: Scrolls Academy
desc: An other Scrolls website I and some friends made for Mojang AB, its a site to help people learn more about there game Scrolls. The site is linked from in the game as well as other external sites.

title: Scrolldier.com
desc: A fan-site for Scrolls a TCG game by Mojang AB

title: Marporto.com
desc: A website for a dog breeder
